korean: 오늘 저녁은 요리하기 귀찮아서 피자 시켰어.
앱 켜자마자 할인 쿠폰 있는지 확인하는 게 우선이지.
쿠폰 쓰면 진짜 많이 싸지는데, 없으면 좀 아까워.
메뉴 고르는 데만 20분 걸렸는데, 선택 장애가 있나 봐.
결국 둘 다 시켜버렸는데, 혼자 먹기엔 좀 많은 것 같아.
그래도 내일 아침에 먹으면 되니까, 괜찮지 뭐.
사이드로 치킨도 추가할까 했는데, 너무 과한 것 같아서 패스.
배달 시간이 30분이라는데, 항상 그것보단 오래 걸려.
초인종 울리고 피자 받는 순간이 제일 행복해, 솔직히.
박스 열자마자 치즈 냄새가 나는데, 완전 침 고여.
첫 조각 뜨거울 때 먹는 게 제일 맛있는데, 입천장 데이기 딱 좋아.
설거지 안 해도 되는 게 배달음식의 최고 장점이야.
english: I didn't feel like cooking dinner tonight, so I ordered pizza.
As soon as I open the app, the first thing is checking if there are any discount coupons.
With a coupon it's so much cheaper, but without one it feels wasteful.
It took me 20 minutes just to choose, I think I have decision paralysis.
I kept going back and forth between combo and pepperoni.
I ended up ordering both, which is probably too much for one person.
But I can eat it tomorrow morning, so whatever, right?
I thought about adding chicken as a side, but that seemed like too much so I passed.
They said delivery would be 30 minutes, but it always takes longer than that.
The moment the doorbell rings and I get the pizza is honestly the happiest.
As soon as I open the box and smell the cheese, I'm literally drooling.
Eating the first slice when it's hot is the best, but perfect for burning the roof of your mouth.
Having it with Coke is an amazing combo.
After eating until I'm full, I'm totally happy.
Not having to do dishes is the best part of delivery food.
